Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe is truly invaluable to you. This product holds immense significance and has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and desires. Given its exceptional value to you, I am confident it will bring about significant benefits and enhancements to your life.

I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price, reflecting its true worth and the exclusivity it offers. My proposal is as follows:

Product Price: $1200000

This offer represents a strategic midpoint between the perceived value of the product to you and the price at which I am willing to part with it. I believe this price is highly favorable and presents an excellent opportunity for both parties involved.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am more than happy to provide further details or discuss any concerns you might have.

I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this remarkable product into your possession.

Warm regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
